name: Grim Symphony
description:
Folowing the rumors , you came from far away lands to solve the mystery about a hidden mansion. Can you survive the crazed horde and silence these dark tunes.

How to play ;

WASD - Movement

Right mouse - Shooting

E - Blast Rune

Q - Time Slowing Rune

R - Reload

In order to properly reload you need to time your reload with the beat if you don't you have to wait for a bit for reload .

Programming

Arqcenick - Zach Howard

Visuals
